sentences.english: First, shifting the triangular obligations to the banking balance sheet is a big part.
sentences.chinese: 首先，將三角債轉移至銀行系統是一個很重要的原因。

sentences.english: There exist chain debts among many corporations.
sentences.chinese: 許多公司之間存在着三角債。

sentences.english: Triangulardebt problems are studied upon the views of graphic theory and networking.
sentences.chinese: 本文用圖論和網絡的理論和方法研究三角債問題。

sentences.english: Triangular-debt problem is the major problem in the economic front at the present time in China.
sentences.chinese: 三角債是我國當前經濟領域中存在的一個突出問題。

sentences.english: And, triangular debts have been replaced with bank loans.
sentences.chinese: 而且，三角債被銀行貸款所替代。

sentences.english: It forms a mass of the"triangle debt"which badly damages the order of the societal economy.
sentences.chinese: 形成了大量的“三角債”，嚴重破壞社會經濟秩序。

sentences.english: It is useful to analyze a debt network and provide a basis in the decision process.
sentences.chinese: 爲三角債的分析研究和決策提供依據。

sentences.english: The theory that the article uses graph talking and network and problem of debt of methodological research triangle.
sentences.chinese: 本文用圖論和網絡的理論和方法研究三角債問題。
